Package shared.communication.params

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptTradeRequest
    AcceptTrade { type (acceptTrade), playerIndex (integer): Who's accepting / rejecting this trade, willAccept (boolean): Whether you accept the trade or not }
    BuildCityRequest
    string type "buildCity" int playerIndex VertexLocation location int x int y String direction
    BuildRoadRequest
    String type "buildRoad" int playerIndex EdgeValue roadLocation boolean free
    BuildSettlementRequest
    BuildSettlement { type (buildSettlement), playerIndex (integer): Who's placing the settlement, vertexLocation (VertexLocation), free (Boolean): Whether this is placed for free (setup) } VertexLocation { x (integer), y (integer), direction (string) = ['SW' or 'SE' or 'E' or 'NE' or 'NW' or 'W'] }
    BuyDevCardRequest
    { "type": "buyDevCard", "playerIndex": "integer" }
    CreateGameRequest
    Wrapper class used to pass parameters during the IServerProxy.createGame API call { "randomTiles": "boolean", "randomNumbers": "boolean", "randomPorts": "boolean", "name": "string" }
    Credentials
    Wrapper object for a user's username and password.
    FinishTurnRequest
    FinishMove { type (finishTurn), playerIndex (integer): Who's sending this command (0-3) }
    JoinGameRequest
    Wrapper object for the IServerProxy.joinGame request JoinGameRequest { id (integer): The ID of the game to join, color (string) = ['red' or 'green' or 'blue' or 'yellow' or 'puce' or 'brown' or 'white' or 'purple' or 'orange']: What color you want to join (or rejoin) as.
    LoadGameRequest
    Wrapper object containing the name of the save file to load.
    MaritimeTradeRequest
    MaritimeTrade { type (maritimeTrade), playerIndex (integer): Who's doing the trading, ratio (integer, optional): The ratio of the trade your doing as an integer (ie.
    OfferTradeRequest
    OfferTrade { type (offerTrade), playerIndex (integer): Who's sending the offer, offer (ResourceList): What you get (+) and what you give (-), receiver (integer): Who you're offering the trade to (0-3) } ResourceList { brick (integer), ore (integer), sheep (integer), wheat (integer), wood (integer) }
    PlayMonopolyRequest
    Monopoly_ { type (Monopoly), resource (string), playerIndex (integer): Who's playing this dev card }
    PlayRoadBuildingRequest
    Road_Building_ { type (Road_Building), playerIndex (integer): Who's placing the roads, spot1 (EdgeLocation), spot2 (EdgeLocation) } EdgeLocation { x (integer), y (integer), direction (string) = ['SW' or 'SE' or 'S' or 'NE' or 'NW' or 'N'] }
    PlaySoldierRequest
    Soldier_ { type (Soldier), playerIndex (integer): Who's playing this dev card, victimIndex (integer): The index of the player to rob, location (HexLocation): the new location of the robber } HexLocation { x (string), y (string) }
    PlayYearOfPlentyRequest
    Year_of_Plenty_ { type (Year_of_Plenty), playerIndex (integer): Who's playing this dev card, resource1 (Resource), resource2 (Resource) }
    PostCommandsRequest
    contains a list of contains
    RobPlayerRequest
    RobPlayer { type (robPlayer), playerIndex (integer): Who's doing the robbing, victimIndex (integer): The order index of the player to rob, location (HexLocation): the new location of the robber } HexLocation { x (string), y (string) }
    RollNumberRequest
    RollNumber { type (rollNumber), playerIndex (integer): Who's sending this command (0-3), number (integer): what number was rolled (2-12) }
    SaveGameRequest
    Wrapper object containing information necessary to save the game.
    SendChatRequest
    SendChat { type (sendChat), playerIndex (integer): Who's sending this chat message, content (string) }
